name: SKUNGELDONK
description:
This is a submission to the GameMaker’s Toolkit Jam 2020 conducted by Mark Brown.

You are Skungeldonk, a wizard that has just retrieved a cursed artefact from a temple and has become a vessel for a demon. The demon grants you power, but as that power grows, your control over it wanes. Get out of the dungeon before the demon’s magic overpowers you, run out of time and you’re dead.
